schema.name: invoice_and_item_number
schema.description: Concatenated invoice and line number associated with the liquor order. This provides a unique identifier for the individual liquor products included in the store order.

schema.name: store_number
schema.description: Unique number assigned to the store who ordered the liquor.

schema.name: item_number
schema.description: Item number for the individual liquor product ordered.

schema.name: bottles_sold
schema.description: The number of bottles of liquor ordered by the store

schema.name: bottle_volume_ml
schema.description: Volume of each liquor bottle ordered in milliliters.

schema.name: sale_dollars
schema.description: Total cost of liquor order (number of bottles multiplied by the state bottle retail)

schema.name: volume_sold_liters
schema.description: Total volume of liquor ordered in liters. (i.e. (Bottle Volume (ml) x Bottles Sold)/1,000)

schema.name: volume_sold_gallons
schema.description: Total volume of liquor ordered in gallons. (i.e. (Bottle Volume (ml) x Bottles Sold)/3785.411784)
